full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,HA CANG RGAN PO DKAR PO BSANGS MCHOD TSA GDUNG BSIL BA'I GA BUR CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES HA CANG RGAN PO DKAR PO BSANGS MCHOD TSA GDUNG BSIL BA'I GA BUR CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNYIGS DUS KYIS 'GRO BA RNAMS KYI BSOD NAMS DMAN ZHIR PHYUGS LA GOD LA SOGS CHOM RKUN YAMS NAD SOGS DANG, DE GOD PA'I NYER TSE BA LAS BYUNG BA LA PHAN SNYAM BSAM PAS, DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN PA AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS RANG GIS LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL TE SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS SO, ,)
